mapper.select: SELECT id, label, recipient_name AS recipientName, phone, postal_code AS postalCode, address, address_detail AS addressDetail, is_default AS isDefault FROM user_addresses WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC, id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_addresses (user_id, label, recipient_name, phone, postal_code, address, address_detail, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{label}, #{recipientName}, #{phone}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{isDefault})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_addresses SET is_default = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId}
